project.name: KEIKI Replatform Off Mainframe (KROM) Project
project.description: Replatform the KEIKI System and provide ongoing operations support.

issues.remedy: Ensure full alignment on testing methodologies, defect triage, and execution strategies.
Implement automated validation scripts, formalize error handling protocols.
Continue real-time monitoring and tuning, supported by hardware upgrades.
Implement data masking protocols and scoped out controlled testing environments.

events.name: System Integration Testing
events.description: Reached 90% completion with all Financial Test Deck scenarios executed.

events.name: Go-Live
events.description: Revised Go-Live date to provide a long weekend contingency for potential unanticipated cutover issues.
